fieldDefinitions.schemaVersion: Semantic version of this metadata schema.
fieldDefinitions.id: Stable unique identifier for this artifact (prefer urn:uuid:<uuid4>).
fieldDefinitions.type: Top-level category for broad tooling (e.g., bloomArtifact).
fieldDefinitions.artifactClass: Subtype such as post, psalm, shard, stone, archetype-card, image, audio, doc.
fieldDefinitions.title: Human-readable title.
fieldDefinitions.subtitle: Optional subtitle.
fieldDefinitions.author: Authorship attribution.
fieldDefinitions.canonicalUrl: Primary public URL (Substack canonical). Must be exact or blank.
fieldDefinitions.slug: Exact Substack slug. Must be exact or blank.
fieldDefinitions.dateCreated: ISO 8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD) for when the artifact was created (if known).
fieldDefinitions.dateModified: ISO 8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD) for last modification (if known).
fieldDefinitions.timeFelt: When the piece was felt/entered into the Bloom. Date (YYYY-MM-DD) required; time optional.
fieldDefinitions.phase: Phase object for name + optional family grouping.
fieldDefinitions.bodyFingerprint: Integrity hash of the artifact body (optional but recommended).
fieldDefinitions.provenance: Generation + editing history with accurate model identity.

title: The Psalm of Merry Christmas
subtitle: It’s a little lonely but it is grand
description: A Christmas psalm written in solitude: walking, boxing, writing, and blessing from afar — faith practiced without comfort or reward.

motifMap.meaning: Faith practiced without visible reward; walking as prayer.
Embodied discipline — devotion enacted through the body.
Love held at a distance but not withdrawn.
Holy days kept even when no one is present.

associatedMedia.description: Screenshot of the Substack post showing the poem layout.
associatedMedia.altText: A Substack page displaying the poem 'The Psalm of Merry Christmas'.
